verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hail, Queen of heaven,
the ocean star,
guide of the wanderer
here below,
thrown on life's surge,
we claim thy care,
save us from peril
and from woe.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mother of Christ,
star of the sea,
pray for the wanderer,
pray for me. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O gentle, chaste,
and spotless Maid,
we sinners make our prayers
through thee;
remind thy Son that he has paid
The price of our iniquity.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Virgin most pure, star of the sea,
pray for the sinner, pray for me. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sojourners in this vale of tears,
to thee, blest advocate, we cry;
Pity our sorrows, calm our fears,
and sooth with hope our misery.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Refuge in grief, star of the sea,
pray for the mourner,
pray for me. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And while to Him Who reigns above,
in Godhead one, in Persons three,
the Source of life, of grace, of love,
homage we pay on bended knee:

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Do thou, bright Queen,
star of the sea,
Pray for thy children,
pray for me. x2
